description.value:
While this spell lasts, nearly invisible tendrils of energy surround you. As part of casting this spell or as a move action once per round, you can direct the energy to do one of the following.

  • Attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver as a melee attack against an adjacent creature. When attempting this melee attack, you can use your key ability score modififier in place of your Strength modifier.
  • Direct bothersome and distressing sensations against an adjacent creature. That creature must succeed at a Will save (DC = 12 + your key ability score modififier) or become @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed} until the beginning of your next turn.
  • Grant you concealment until thr start of your next turn.
